OBJECTIVE.description: Talk to Vision, Black Widow, and Nick Fury to find the correct password for Weasel.
OBJECTIVE.name: stark_obj10

OBJECTIVE.description: Find Dr. Pym's cybernetic helmet on the Omega Base and return it to him at Stark Tower.
OBJECTIVE.name: stark_obj20

OBJECTIVE.description: Get the decryption module from Black Widow and take it to The Vision.
OBJECTIVE.name: stark_obj30

OBJECTIVE.description: Find the Ultimo schematics from the Mandarin's Palace and give them to Colonel Fury at Stark Tower.
OBJECTIVE.name: stark_obj40

OBJECTIVE.description: Ask Dr. Pym to look at the Quinjet's data feed for Wyatt Wingfoot.
OBJECTIVE.name: stark_obj50

OBJECTIVE.description: Find Tony Stark's missing cufflink and return it to Edwin Jarvis.
OBJECTIVE.name: stark_obj60

OBJECTIVE.description: Talk to Dr. Pym and Vision, then return to Weasel to give him the name of a hacker he can trust.
OBJECTIVE.name: stark_obj70
